title: Obama would make a decent therapist. Ever possible in India?
selftext:
Such a refreshing watch. Hasan's face when Obama says he's proud of him is the best.
You can see Obama actually thinks and speaks. Such competency is just mind blowing.
comments: What a charismatic guy Obama is.
The US politicians retire gracefully. In India politicians never retire...
